titleStmt.title: A Narration of the grievous visitation and dreadfull desertion of Mr. Peacock, in his last sicknesse together with the sweet and gracious issue, in his comfortable restauration, to the joy of Gods salvation, before his most blessed end and heavenly death, Decemb. 4, 1611.
titleStmt.author: I. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.H. for Robert Milbourn ...,

notesStmt.note: Epistle "To the Christian reader" signed: I.C.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
